parameters.query: SELECT pm.*, im.purchase_price FROM products_master pm LEFT JOIN inventory_master im ON pm.id = im.product_id WHERE pm.id = $1
SELECT * FROM emerging_markets WHERE market_code = $1 AND is_active = true
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers WHERE dest_country = $1 AND is_active = true ORDER BY priority ASC LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO emerging_market_listings (product_id, market_id, title_local, price_local, currency_code, target_language, listing_status) SELECT $1, em.id, $2, $3, $4, $5, 'draft' FROM emerging_markets em WHERE em.market_code = $6 RETURNING id
